nodes.body:
This marker, which is derived from the present of the verb “to do,” is used with a head noun that takes the function of an instrument of cause or manner.

  • དཀྲུག་བྱེད་ཀྱི་དབྱུག་པ། “The stick that’s used for stirring…”
  • ནད་གསོ་བྱེད་ཀྱི་གཉེན་པོ། “The antidote that cures illnesses…”
nodes.title: The Nominalizer བྱེད་
